issue.title: [CF 1497] Icon that pops up in bg/arena if certain item is equipped
issue.body:
Hello Cybeloras!

 

Is there a way to create an icon that appears at the start of a bg/arena if my pve trinket is equipped?

 

Best Regard,

Herpi


> Posted by CurseForge user herpii | Imported from CurseForge issue #1497 | Raw

comments.body:
1. Create an Item icon for your trinket
  2. Check "only if equipped"
  3. On conditions choose "Instance Type" and check Arena and Battlegrounds

> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg
